column4: Is there anyway to turn of the microphone so I don't hear my own voice... but it is still active+??
I think you want to check volume manager.. and lower the microphone in the "playback" section.. not "recording"
skype doesn't use pulseaudio so you've got a skype with alsa problem
enter a windows machine?.. you mean connect to a shared folder? login using some kind of remote desktop? check the website on it??
